body: Been a while since I last saw a sideways 69 in a doujin

HOLY romance is so underrated. Some small part of me wants this for me, but I'm actually content that something so simultaneously heart-warming and erotic can only exist in our minds and fiction. It's what keeps me moving every day. Maybe we humans really will come up with some way to transport our whole consciousness into a digital world. When that happens, lolicon will be a serious way of living for some people, and I'm not sure if thats a blessing, or if I'll lose who I am in the proccess.
From the way he draw sex pose and interaction, i'm pretty sure the artist is simping to hoshino and wants to have romantic relationship
